name: klawf

abilities.name: anger-shell
abilities.description: When an attack causes its HP to drop to half or less, the Pokémon gets angry. This lowers its Defense and Sp. Def stats but boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

abilities.name: regenerator
abilities.description: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

description: Klawf hangs upside-down from cliffs, waiting for prey. But Klawf can’t remain in this position for long because its blood rushes to its head.
